Description:
Join the team redefining how the world experiences design.Where and how you can workWhat you’d be doing in this roleAbout the group/teamHowdy, howdy! This opportunity is huge - we are a small Smartmockups team, working on the Canva product!  Smartmockups helps people and businesses the world over create engaging visual materials. Our online mockup tool features a stellar mockup library, intuitive design tools, and is available anywhere, anytime. Smartmockups is the easiest way to showcase your designs on real-world products. You'll be part of our Processing team who's responsible for turning amazing photos into even more awesome Mockups.What you'll do:Creating Mockups in PSD - Your role will involve creating pixel-perfect paths with the pen tool, creating realistic masks with the created paths and brush tool, and working with blending modes to achieve a realistic look (i.e., highlights and shadows).
Make the Best Possible Foundation for our Mockups - You will play a crucial role in setting the foundation for our mockups, ensuring they are of the highest quality and meet our standards.
Retouching imperfections and whitening colorful products with adjustment layers.What we're looking for:Amazing attention to detail
Experience with Adobe Photoshop
A deep-seated love for graphic design, photo retouching  and an amazingly strong portfolio to prove itJob Details
